natlang.rdg.model
Interface RSVertex

All Superinterfaces:
parlevink.parlegraph.model.MComponent, parlevink.parlegraph.model.MVertex, parlevink.xml.XMLizable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CannedText, PlotElement, RhetRelation, RSDepTreeModel
public interface RSVertex
extends parlevink.parlegraph.model.MVertex

RSVertex models a structure in a Rhetorical Dependency Structure. This can be a RhetRelation or a RSDepTreeModel. At the moment only has a function to determine whether the object is a RSDepTreeModel or a RhetRelation

Method Summary
 java.util.Iterator getParent()
          Returns the RSVertices of which this RSVertex is the nucleus or satellite, if there are any
 java.lang.String getType()
          Checks whether the object is a RSDepTreeModel, or not (in which case it is a RhetRelation)
